General.Name: LNA Sante SA
General.Description: LNA Santé SA engages in the management and operation of health establishments. The company operates retirement homes, medical and rehabilitation care, home hospital, mental health clinic, and health center. LNA Santé SA was founded in 1990 and is based in Vertou, France.

2.Name: Mr. Willy  Siret
2.Title: Deputy Chief Exec. Officer of Operations & Director
